name: Wild Bike Extreme Tricks
description:
Control your bicycle on a dangerous track with various obstacles. This game is designed especially for the fans of stunt racing, so you can boost your skills by riding the offroad bicycle in crazy tracks!

LOTS OF VARIOUS STUNTS
Perform crazy flips and loops at the maximum speed. But remember to land properly, don't break your bike!

6+ CHARACTERS TO PLAY
Choose your favorite character and make him the champion of the dirt bike racing. Become the favorite racer for the crowd of fans!

6+ CYCLOCROSS BIKES
Earn points to unlock new bikes with improved rates of acceleration and max speed. Become the fastest rider of a challenge!

10+ SNEAKY OBSTACLES
Use ramps and loops to jump over traps on hazardous terrain. Don't bump into them - your bike will be wrecked at pieces!

ENDLESS FUN
Cool and bright graphics, addictive physics-based gameplay and realistic sound effects wouldn't leave you indifferent! Enjoy crazy stunts on exciting speed!
